operation.name: insert
operation.sql: INSERT INTO council_apply (child_id,council_code, project_code, project_name, form_id, amount, time_limit, time_unit, customer_id, customer_name, apply_man_id, apply_man_name, apply_dept_id, apply_dept_name, council_type, council_type_desc, apply_time, status, company_name, mother_company_apply, mother_council_code, raw_add_time) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
operation.sqlmap: INSERT INTO council_apply (child_id,council_code, project_code, project_name, form_id, amount, time_limit, time_unit, customer_id, customer_name, apply_man_id, apply_man_name, apply_dept_id, apply_dept_name, council_type, council_type_desc, apply_time, status, company_name, mother_company_apply, mother_council_code, raw_add_time) VALUES (#childId#,#councilCode#, #projectCode#, #projectName#,#formId#,#amount#,#timeLimit#,#timeUnit#, #customerId#, #customerName#, #applyManId#, #applyManName#, #applyDeptId#, #applyDeptName#, #councilType#, #councilTypeDesc#, #applyTime#, #status#, #companyName#, #motherCompanyApply#, #motherCouncilCode#, #rawAddTime#) <selectKey resultClass ="long" keyProperty ="applyId" > SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID </selectKey>

operation.name: update
operation.sql: UPDATE council_apply SET child_id=?, council_code=?, project_code=?, project_name=?, form_id=?, amount=?, time_limit =?, time_unit =?, customer_id=?, customer_name=?, apply_man_id=?, apply_man_name=?, apply_dept_id=?, apply_dept_name=?, council_type=?, council_type_desc=?, apply_time=?, status=?, company_name=?, mother_company_apply=?, mother_council_code=? WHERE apply_id=?

operation.name: updateByFormId
operation.sql: UPDATE council_apply SET child_id=?, project_code=?, project_name=?, form_id=?, amount=?, time_limit =?, time_unit =?, customer_id=?, customer_name=?, apply_man_id=?, apply_man_name=?, apply_dept_id=?, apply_dept_name=?, council_type=?, council_type_desc=?, apply_time=?, status=?, company_name=?, mother_company_apply=? , mother_council_code=? WHERE council_code=?

operation.name: updateProjectCode
operation.sql: UPDATE council_apply SET child_id=?, council_code=?, project_name=?, form_id=?, amount=?, time_limit =?, time_unit =?, customer_id=?, customer_name=?, apply_man_id=?, apply_man_name=?, apply_dept_id=?, apply_dept_name=?, council_type=?, council_type_desc=?, apply_time=?, status=?, company_name=?, mother_company_apply=? , mother_council_code=? WHERE project_code=?

operation.name: findByCondition
operation.sql: SELECT child_id,apply_id ,council_code ,project_code ,project_name, form_id,amount,time_limit ,time_unit ,customer_id ,customer_name ,apply_man_id ,apply_man_name ,apply_dept_id ,apply_dept_name ,council_type ,council_type_desc ,apply_time ,status ,company_name,mother_company_apply,mother_council_code,raw_add_time ,raw_update_time FROM council_apply WHERE apply_id=?
operation.sqlmap:
SELECT child_id,apply_id ,council_code ,project_code ,project_name ,form_id,amount,time_limit ,time_unit ,customer_id ,customer_name ,apply_man_id ,apply_man_name ,apply_dept_id ,apply_dept_name ,council_type ,council_type_desc ,apply_time ,status ,company_name,mother_company_apply,mother_council_code,raw_add_time ,raw_update_time FROM council_apply
WHERE 1=1
<dynamic>
<isGreaterThan property="councilApply.councilType" compareValue="0" prepend=" and "> ${cdata-start} council_type = #councilApply.councilType# ${cdata-end} </isGreaterThan>
<isNotEmpty property="councilApply.applyDeptName" prepend=" and "> ${cdata-start} apply_dept_name = #councilApply.applyDeptName# ${cdata-end} </isNotEmpty>
<isNotEmpty property="councilApply.applyManName" prepend=" and "> apply_man_name LIKE concat('%',#councilApply.applyManName#,'%')
</isNotEmpty>
<isNotEmpty property="councilApply.projectCode" prepend=" and "> ${cdata-start} project_code like concat('%',#councilApply.projectCode#,'%') ${cdata-end} </isNotEmpty>
<isNotEmpty property="councilApply.customerName" prepend=" and "> customer_name LIKE concat('%',#councilApply.customerName#,'%')
</isNotEmpty>
<isNotEmpty property="councilApply.councilCode" prepend=" and "> ${cdata-start} council_code = #councilApply.councilCode# ${cdata-end} </isNotEmpty>
<isNotEmpty property="councilApply.status" prepend=" and "> ${cdata-start} status = #councilApply.status# ${cdata-end} </isNotEmpty>
<isNotEmpty property="councilTypeCodeList" prepend=" and "> council_code in <iterate property="councilTypeCodeList" open="(" close=")" conjunction=","> #councilTypeCodeList[]# </iterate> </isNotEmpty>
<isNotEmpty property="companyNames" prepend=" and "> company_name in <iterate property="companyNames" open="(" close=")" conjunction=","> #companyNames[]# </iterate> </isNotEmpty>
</dynamic> order by apply_time desc <isGreaterThan property="pageSize" compareValue="0" prepend=""> LIMIT #limitStart#,#pageSize# </isGreaterThan>

operation.name: findByConditionCount
operation.sql: SELECT child_id, apply_id ,council_code ,project_code ,project_name ,form_id,amount,time_limit ,time_unit ,customer_id ,customer_name ,apply_man_id ,apply_man_name ,apply_dept_id ,apply_dept_name ,council_type ,council_type_desc ,apply_time ,status ,company_name,mother_company_apply,mother_council_code,raw_add_time ,raw_update_time FROM council_apply WHERE apply_id=?
operation.sqlmap:
SELECT count(*) totalCount FROM council_apply WHERE 1=1
<dynamic> <isGreaterThan property="councilApply.councilType" compareValue="0" prepend=" and "> ${cdata-start} council_type = #councilApply.councilType# ${cdata-end} </isGreaterThan>
<isNotEmpty property="councilApply.applyDeptName" prepend=" and "> ${cdata-start} apply_dept_name = #councilApply.applyDeptName# ${cdata-end} </isNotEmpty>
<isNotEmpty property="councilApply.applyManName" prepend=" and "> apply_man_name LIKE concat('%',#councilApply.applyManName#,'%')
</isNotEmpty>
<isNotEmpty property="councilApply.projectCode" prepend=" and "> ${cdata-start} project_code like concat('%',#councilApply.projectCode#,'%') ${cdata-end} </isNotEmpty>
<isNotEmpty property="councilApply.customerName" prepend=" and "> customer_name LIKE concat('%',#councilApply.customerName#,'%')
</isNotEmpty>
<isNotEmpty property="councilApply.councilCode" prepend=" and "> ${cdata-start} council_code = #councilApply.councilCode# ${cdata-end} </isNotEmpty>
<isNotEmpty property="councilApply.status" prepend=" and "> ${cdata-start} status = #councilApply.status# ${cdata-end} </isNotEmpty>
<isNotEmpty property="councilTypeCodeList" prepend=" and "> council_code in <iterate property="councilTypeCodeList" open="(" close=")" conjunction=","> #councilTypeCodeList[]# </iterate> </isNotEmpty>
<isNotEmpty property="companyNames" prepend=" and "> company_name in <iterate property="companyNames" open="(" close=")" conjunction=","> #companyNames[]# </iterate> </isNotEmpty>
</dynamic>
